ERROR.STAY_DETAILS_COMPLETE: Stay details of reservation has been completed
ERROR.STAY_DETAILS_PENDING: Stay details of reservation is pending
ERROR.INVALID_START_END_DATES: Start date is greatet than end date
ERROR.GUEST_NOT_FOUND: Guest not found for this reservation
ERROR.LASTNAME_NOT_MATCH: Last Name does not match with reservation details
ERROR.DOCUMENT_NOT_VERIFIED: Document submitted is not matching uploaded docs
ERROR.OCR_NAME_MISMATCH: Name on document does not match
ERROR.OCR_NATIONALITY_MISMATCH: Nationality does not match with uploaded document
ERROR.OCR_DOCUMENT_EXPIRED: {0} has expired, please upload a valid document
ERROR.OCR_EXCEPTION_CONNECT: OCR Exception, Unable to connect OCR Server
ERROR.HEALTH_DECLARATION_COMPLETE: Health Decalaration form has been signed
ERROR.HEALTH_DECLARATION_PENDING: Health Declaration form has not been signed
ERROR.PAY_ZERO_AMOUNT: Payable amount should be greater than zero
ERROR.PAYMENT_RECORD_NOT_FOUND: Payment record for the reservation does not found
ERROR.NOT_FOUND: The page you have requested does not exists.
ERROR.PRECHECKIN_NOT_COMPLETED: Precheckin for this reservation has not been completed
ERROR.CHECKIN_NOT_COMPLETED: Checkin for this reservation has not been completed
ERROR.CHECKOUT_ALREADY_COMPLETED: Checkout for this reservation has already been completed
ERROR.CHECKIN_ALREADY_COMPLETED: Checkin for this reservation has already been completed
ERROR.INVALID_PARAMETERS: Error while processing. please check parameters.
ERROR.SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong. please try again later.
